content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron chests at positions (0.5, 0.5) and (1.5, 0.5) for storing iron plates.

### Coal Mining and Storage System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) for extracting coal.
- Wooden chests at positions (40.5, -82.5) and (41.5, -83.5) for storing extracted coal.
- BeltGroup with belts at various positions for transporting coal.

### Iron Ore Harvesting System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) for extracting iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Item Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) for transferring items from the chest at position (56.5, -83.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items with full inventory
- Ensure there is enough space in the inventory before attempting to extract items from entities.

### Errors when harvesting resources with full inventory
- Free up inventory space before attempting to harvest resources to avoid failed harvesting actions.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Verify the availability of items in the target entity before attempting to extract them to prevent extraction failures.
